General.Name: The Saudi British Bank
General.Description: Saudi Awwal Bank, together with its subsidiaries, provides banking and financial services in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company operates through Wealth & Personal Banking, Corporate and Institutional Banking, Treasury, Capital Markets, and Others segments. The company's personal banking services include current and savings, and commodity investment accounts; personal and home financing, and financing against cash deposits products; credit, debit, and prepaid cards; wealth management solutions; investment services; payments and transfer services; private banking services; safe deposit lockers; and online, mobile, and phone banking services. Its business banking services comprise deposit accounts, credit facilities, and business credit cards; liquidity and cash management services, including collection and payment management services, and point of sale services; trade and receivables finance services, which include export and import services, guarantees, structured trade solutions, and e-solutions; and markets products and services comprising foreign exchange, derivative solutions, deposits and loans, bonds, fixed income, structured products, and Islamic solutions. The company also acts as an insurance agent; and purchases, sells, and leases land and real estate properties. Saudi Awwal Bank was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

8.Name: Mr. Majed Kamal Aldeen Najm
8.Title: Deputy Managing Director of Corp. & Institutional Banking
